scripts.clean: rm -rf dist build .parcel-cache src/data/index.json src/data/index.mjs src/functions/index.mjs src/ui/index.mjs src/index.html
scripts.build-data-json: python src/utils/buildData.py src/data src/data/index.json && prettier -w src/data/index.json
scripts.build-data-js: node wingechr-webapp/scripts/buildDataMjs.cjs src/data/index.json src/data/index.mjs && prettier -w src/data/index.mjs
scripts.build-functions-js: node wingechr-webapp/scripts/buildFunctionsMjs.cjs src/functions src/data/index.json src/functions/index.mjs && prettier -w src/functions/index.mjs
scripts.build-ui-js: node wingechr-webapp/scripts/buildUiMjs.cjs src/ui src/ui/index.html src/ui/index.mjs && prettier -w src/ui/index.mjs
scripts.build-index-html: node wingechr-webapp/scripts/buildIndexHtml.cjs src/ui/index.mjs src/ui/index.html src/index.html true && prettier -w src/index.html
scripts.build-static: npm run build-data-json && npm run build-data-js && npm run build-functions-js && npm run build-ui-js && npm run build-index-html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-static && npx parcel build --no-cache --no-scope-hoist --no-source-maps --dist-dir dist --public-url ./
